metadata.name: Metropolis Night
metadata.description:
We divide spaces into smaller spaces which we conquer and live in our solitude. We call that Metropolis.

This  artwork is created with code using custom subdivison algorithm which divides a rectangle into 9 pieces recursively. It is made up of 531441 rectangles forming a hazy cityscape at night, making it the most complex and detailed Metropolis piece that ever exists. 

6000 x  8000 px PNG

Murat Atimtay 2023
